transcript:
Har Har Mahadev. Shiv Shambhu Bholenath ki kripa aap par bani rahe. Bas thoda intezar kare. Ashutosh jald hi aapke call ka jawab denge.

Hello.

Hello.

Ashutosh ji baat kar rahe hain?

Han baat kar raha hun.

Sir main Nidhi baat kar rahi hun senior manager IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap sir?

Main theek hun.

Sir aapke account manager se aapki baat hui thi morning mein. Call ke basis pe jo unse baat hui hai uske basis pe aapka ek negative feedback mere paas receive hua hai sir. Aap please bataiye sir abhi kuch issue aa raha tha service ko leke ya fir account manager ki side se koi issue tha sir?

Account manager mein kyun appoint karte hain aap log?

Account manager kyun appoint karte hain? Aapko agar koi problem hoti hai usko solve karne mein, aapko help karne mein aur aapka catalog mein agar aap kuch updation karana chahte ho to usme help karne mein.

To mam main aapko ek baat bataun ki maine jabse aapki company ka subscription liya hai, chahe is time ho chahe last time raha ho.

Ji, theek hai. Mujhe koi query nahi aati hai, koi lead nahi aati hai aur iske liye meri kai baar baat hui hai. Hmm. Maine iske upgrade bhi nahi kiya tha aapne to aur dobara maine subscription lene se mana bhi kar diya tha.

Hmm.

At least dobara fir se aapki company se call kafi baar aa chuki thi fir se mujhe laga ki ho sakta hai ki service change ho gayi ho, theek ho gayi ho. Hmm. Hmm.

Maine wapas se dobara subscription liya.

Hmm. But problem abhi bhi still there hai. Aap account mera open kare usko acche se dekhe. Aapko khud idea lag jayega ki koi customer kis liye leta hai aur uske sath kya hota hai.

Aap keh rahe ho ki aapke paas leads vagera nahi aa rahi hai IndiaMART se. To maine abhi check kiya maine aapka account bhi open kiya hai aapke account mein abhi total 29 products aapne add karaye hain sir. Aapke jo bhi products hai wo sab mere khayal se medical ko leke hai.

Ji mam. Medical. Hai na sir? Medical equipments hai sare.

To uske regarding agar main buyleads pan India se check karti hun to mere ko leads to sir portal pe dikh rahi hai.

Mam pan India ki hamari pehle to baat hi nahi hui thi kyunki hum service pan India provide nahi kar payenge.

Okay. To aapka dealing area kitna hai sir?

Hamne keval UP ke liye baat kiya tha aapse.
Hmm. Hmm. Pichli pichle subscription mein hamara pura all India tha humne usko saturate kar diya ki one state rakhenge. Hmm. Aayega to theek hai nahi to fir chhod denge. Hmm. Filhal abhi mujhe jo bhi buyleads aayi hai ek do char. Hmm. Humne usko dekha bhi hai but wo relevant nahi hoti hai. Problem ye hai ki relevant hi nahi hoti hai. Ek do logo se meri baat hui hai but genuine nahi hoti hai. Ek do logo se meri baat hui na this is the improper. To Hmm.

Mujhe nahi lagta ki mujhe aage continue karna chahiye exactly.

Aapko aage continue nahi karna chahiye aap ye bol rahe ho?

Han jab dekhiye main apna pura time deke bhi dekh chuka hun. Time na deke bhi dekh chuka hun. Dono tarike se maine try mar liya. Lekin satisfaction nahi hai mujhe kisi bhi tarike se. Hmm. Main satisfied ho jaun ki main sab kuch achcha hai. To

But abhi jo aapki Mansi se baat hui thi I think aapne unko kuch references bhi diye the ki inke according aapki catalog honi chahiye. To she was working on it sir. Aaj hi meri baat hui hai uske bare mein. Aaj hi baat hui hai maine aapko call karne se pehle maine aapka case pehle unhi ke sath discuss kiya hai. Unhone mujhe bataya ki ye issue aa rahe hain abhi sir ke sath. Abhi dekho sir maine UP ka filter laga ke leads dekhi hai to mere ko kuch leads dikh rahi hai UP se bhi. Plus maine aapki calls aur inquiries open karke dekhi hai. Inquiries aur calls bhi generate ho rahi hai sir aapko particular areas se. Bhale hi kam ho rahi hai sir kyunki dekho sir duration kam hai to thoda sa inquiries bhi kam hi generate hongi but aisa nahi hai ki bilkul bhi nahi ho rahi hai.

Mam ek lead to kam se kam banta hai na ek lead to kam se kam aaye aisa ki ha mera kam ho jaye. Hamne jo aapko pay kiya kam se kam utna hi revenue wapas aa jaye.

Nikal jayega sir aap abhi iske liye itna demotivate mat hoiye aap hume bataiye sir ki aap Ji.

Main kitne lambe time se aapke sath kam kar raha hun ek bhi relevant mere ko nahi aaya is tarike ka ki main aage iske bare mein soch bhi paun. Hmm hmm hmm. Dekhiye koi bhi businessman kya chahta hai mam customer kya chahta hai. Ji bilkul sir. Customer ko motivate karna mera kam hai. Usko sold out karna mera kam hai lekin hum chahte hain ki kam se kam relevant dealer deal aayegi to hum usko kam se kam kuch to kar payenge na. Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Abhi kuch aa hi nahi raha hai sir aur jo aa bhi rahe hain wo relevant nahi hai wo unki requirement kuch aur hai wo sab ye bolte hain ki sir aap dekh kuch aur rahe the aur aap kuch aur rahe hain. Hmm. Abhi ye rule. Achcha. To matlab lead consume karne ke baad aapko lagta hai ki wo relevant nahi hai aapke liye ya fir aapko jo lead title hai usi ko dekh ke lagta hai ki wo relevant nahi hai aapke liye. Agar lead title se hi lagta hai. Consume karne ke baad matlab lead title theek aa raha hai. Contact details milte hain na. Haan bilkul sir. Means sir lead title theek aa raha hai. Sir actually kya hota hai na concern ye do tarike se jata hai ya to lead title hi galat aa raha hai to to hum yahan se aapki mapping check kare mapping correct kare. Agar lead title theek aa raha hai to iska matlab buylead thing theek se kam kar rahi hai mapping theek ho rakhi hai aapki match making sahi se aa rahi hai uske baad mein jo buyer ne requirement dali hai uske baad mein aapko baat karne se pata chalta hai ki uski kuch aur hi requirement thi. Aapka second wala concern hai hai na sir? Ji mam. Theek hai. Iske alawa bataiye sir aur kya concern hai aapka?

Mam concern to ek hi hai I want only buyleads not inquiries. Haan. Abhi usme aap kaise karwate ho ya kaise aa raha hai. Is it still? Main ek kam kar leti hun sir. Haan. Aapne kuch references diye hain Mansi ko. Aapne kuch customer ke naam bataye hain. Ek genuine medica karke company hai Delhi ki. Hmm hmm. They are doing same business. Same to same sare products same hai sir. Haan almost 90% product hamare match karte hain. 90 Mansi tumhare paas unki GL ID hai jinhone jinka naam sir ne bataya hai? Kya naam hai batao? Sir aap mujhe please company ka naam bataiye wapas se main note down kar leti hun aur main ek kam karti hun aapka ek group create karti hun whatsapp pe hum un aapki catalog mein unke catalog mein products check karte hain wapas se ki aap mein kaun se added hai aur unme kaun se added hai. Jo unme added hai aur aapki catalog mein added nahi hai hum wo aapki catalog mein add karenge but usse pehle hum uski details aapko whatsapp pe share karenge. Aap usko approve kariyega hum unko aapki profile mein add karte jayenge. Fir iske sath sath main aapko ek list of category dungi ki ye category hai jo hume aapki profile mein add karni hai. Aap wo category approve karoge to wo category hum aapki profile mein add kar denge. Theek hai? Ek baar dekhte hain sir ye practice karke ki leads flow badhta hai kya. Kya hota hai sir jitne sare product add honge jitni sari categories add hongi utna hi aapka leads ka flow IndiaMART ki side se badhega. Theek hai sir? Mam mere ko sara understood hai. Main itne lambe time se kam kar raha hun market mein jis company ka maine naam bataya aapko wo mera competitor hai IndiaMART ke. Theek hai. To abhi unko deal aa rahi hai. Main wahi wahi keh rahi hun sir unko aa rahi hai aapko nahi aa rahi hai to fir ye kahin na kahin product update karne ka aur kahin na kahin category update karne ka fark hai sir. Aap mujhe please unki company ka wapas se naam bataiye main ek bari group create karati hun whatsapp pe aur sare product aapka aapke unse match karati hun catalog mein. Aap naam bataye. G E N U I N E. Haan ji. Medica Private Limited. Haan ji. Didiya Seth New Delhi ki ye Manish Srivastava ji hai. Manish Srivastava ji hai. Yahi hai na sir Manish Srivastava ji jo hai. New Delhi se. Wahi hai wahi hai. Copy kar liya hai sir maine inki company ka naam main inke product bata deti hun abhi kitne products inki profile mein hai abhi aapki profile mein 29 product hai aur inki profile mein sir 83 product hai. Hmm. Main sare as it is add kara dun sir? Kara do aap. Kara deti hun sir main. Ye kam main kara deti hun sir 83 main aapko ye commit nahi karungi ki main ek din mein add kara dungi sir one week ka aap mujhe time dijiyega. One week week mein daily basis pe hum do char panch 10 product karke add karenge one week mein total complete ho jayega ye. Haan theek hai koi issue nahi hai. Theek hai whatsapp group create kar rahi hun aapko jo bhi concern ho us whatsapp group mein main bhi available rahungi aap mujhe wahan se reach kar sakte ho ya to fir main wo mera direct calling number bhi hoga jo whatsapp group mein added hoga. Aap mujhe us number pe connect bhi kar sakte ho aur ye mera official number hai aap mujhe is number pe bhi connect kar sakte ho sir. Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai abhi ke liye main aapka concern close kar dun kyunki wapas se aapka ek concern mere paas raise ho gaya tha negative feedback ko lekar ke abhi ke liye main aapka concern close kar dun aapko kuch bhi concern hota hai aap mujhe whatsapp group pe dal dijiye ya to mujhe direct calling kar lijiyega. Theek hai. Theek hai sir? Theek hai. Thank you so much for time sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- No queries or leads after subscription.

- Dissatisfied with the service.

- Buyleads received are not relevant.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Will create a WhatsApp group for communication.

- Will add products from competitor's catalog.

- Will provide a list of categories to add.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add products in one week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, competitor
